description: Structural detail sheet with shearwall schedule, holdown schedule, holdown/column schedule, slab edge detail, anchor bolt detail, stud wall/shear wall section, and foundation/wall sections. Contains 8 numbered details across the sheet.
key_content: Shearwall schedule: Mark 1 = 15/32 STR O.S., 6" edge / 12" field nailing, 340 PLF, one side
Shearwall schedule: Mark 2 = 15/32 STR O.S., 4" edge / 12" field nailing, 510 PLF, one side
Shearwall note: special inspection required for nailing at 4" O.C. or less
Shearwall note: use common wire nails for all sheathing nailing
Holdown schedule: Mark 1 = HD12, 4x4 post (uplift value partially obscured by watermark)
Holdown notes: hardware must be secured in place prior to foundation pour, must be observed before casting
Sill bolt: 5/8" A.B. with plate washer
Stud wall at shear wall section (Detail 5)
Typical section of footing at holdown (Detail 8)
NOT SHOWN: roof-to-wall connection details (may be on S3)
NOT SHOWN: DTC clip specs (may be on S3)

drawing_zones.content: Holdown schedule table and footing section at holdown
Shearwall schedule table with 2 marks and shearwall notes
Holdown/column schedule, plan and section views, holdown notes 1-7, typical section of footing at holdown
Slab section detail with wall plate connection and mudsill
Stud wall at shear wall section showing sheathing, double top plate, anchor bolt
Anchor bolt / sill bolt detail â€” 5/8" A.B. with plate washer, P.T. sill plate
Foundation/wall section showing stucco, building paper, P.T. sill plate, rebar, anchor bolt
